statements.select:
select t1.MATER_NO,t1.MATER_NAME,t1.MATER_CODE,t1.MATER_MKIND,t1.MATER_TYPE,t1.MIN_TIME,t1.MAX_TIME, t1.MAIN_UNIT,t1.MATER_SPEC,t1.MATER_DESC,t1.SEQ_INDEX, CASE t1.slms_flag WHEN '0' THEN '复位' WHEN '1' THEN '新增' WHEN '2' THEN '修改' WHEN '3' THEN '删除' END AS slms_flag from View_Psb_Material t1
T1.MATER_NO LIKE '%'||#where.MATER_NO#||'%'
T1.MATER_MKIND LIKE '%'||#where.MATER_MKIND#||'%'
T1.MATER_TYPE LIKE '%'||#where.MATER_TYPE#||'%'
T1.MATER_SPEC LIKE '%'||#where.MATER_SPEC#||'%'
T1.MATER_DESC LIKE '%'||#where.MATER_DESC#||'%'
ORDER BY t1.MATER_MKIND,t1.MATER_TYPE,t1.MATER_NO

select t1.* from View_Psb_Material t1
T1.MATER_NO = #where.MATER_NO#
